action.action-desc: Mr. Costa (for himself, Mr. Garamendi, Mr. Vargas, Mr. Bera of California, and Mr. Cárdenas) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To authorize the construction of the expansion of Shasta Dam in California.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Shasta Dam Expansion Act of 2014.
Section 103(d)(1)(B) of title I of Public Law 108–361 (the Calfed Bay-Delta Authorization Act, 118 Stat. 1681) is amended by—

clause.text: If the Secretary determines a project described in clause (i), subclause (I) of subparagraph (A) is feasible, the Secretary, subject to appropriations, is authorized to carry out the project in a manner that is substantially in accordance with the recommended plan, and subject to the conditions described in the feasibility study.

subsection.text: striking in clause (ii) the project and inserting a project described in clause (i), subclause (I) of subparagraph (A).
